plot: Two novelists are each working to finish their respective novels. But their collaborative relationship is put to the test as they describe scenes from their works, and learn they may be competing for the same goal.
title: The Writer's Dilemma
plot_es: Two novelists are each working to finish their respective novels. But their collaborative relationship is put to the test as they describe scenes from their works, and learn they may be competing for the same goal.
plot_en: Two novelists are each working to finish their respective novels. But their collaborative relationship is put to the test as they describe scenes from their works, and learn they may be competing for the same goal.
